readable.title: 530454257_66d58b49ee
readable.content: A boy in camouflage jacket notices several yellow ducks on display . A little boy , in a camouflage jacket , looks at a display of many yellow rubber ducks . A young boy looks at a display of rubber ducks . A young boy wearing army gear is picking up a rubber ducky in a market . Small boy looking at a display of yellow rubber ducks .
